hymn.title: Lo, the Spirit is now working!

layout.singingstanza: Lo, the Spir -- it is now work -- ing! To con -- vict all men of sin, Christ be -- came a u -- nique sin -- ner, Men, as pro -- di -- gals, to win. Oh, the Spir -- it is now work -- ing! Sanc -- ti -- fy -- ing, sweep -- ing, search -- ing; Men, con -- vict -- ing and in -- spir -- ing, To sal -- va -- tion He doth bring.

lyrics.stanza: Lo, the Spirit is now working! To convict all men of sin, Christ became the unique sinner, Men, as prodigals, to win.
Oh, the Spirit is now working! Sanctifying, sweeping, searching; Men, convicting and inspiring, To salvation He doth bring.
Lo, the Spirit is now working! To convict of righteousness, For which Christ hath resurrected; All the nations thus to bless.
Lo, the Spirit is now working! Satan's judgment to proclaim; Thus releasing from his bondage All who would not share his shame.
Lo, the Spirit is now working! To proclaim to every man Sin, and righteousness, and judgment; God's economy and plan.
